string.name: same_size_press_drag
string.value: Long press and drag an item of the same size

string.name: different_size_press_drag
string.value: Long press and drag items of different sizes

string.name: directly_drag_item
string.value: Drag and drop items directly without long pressing

string.name: show_jitter_animation
string.value: After pressing and holding the item, a jitter animation is displayed

string.name: text
string.value: Located in the southern part of Qinghai Province, with an average altitude of more than 4,000 meters, the Sanjiangyuan area is the headwaters of the Yangtze River, the Yellow River and the Lancang River, and is known as the "Chinese Water Tower". Here, snow leopards can be seen gazing into the distance from the cliffs, and herds of Tibetan antelopes can be seen frolicking.
